text: Anyone know of an active community of academic mathematicians?

elements.text: Anyone know of an active community of academic mathematicians?

text: Correct me if I have a misconception of it, but the feedback loop there has always seemed kind of slow.

elements.text: Correct me if I have a misconception of it, but the feedback loop there has always seemed kind of slow.

text: I personally feel that maths is not a fast area, and generally if people are working in similar areas, you will meet them either through collaboration or conferences.

elements.text: I personally feel that maths is not a fast area, and generally if people are working in similar areas, you will meet them either through collaboration or conferences.
